Content.Text:
<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
At the General Store, you can buy crop
seeds and other items you need for your
farm.
<PAGE>
You can also have <RED>bouquets</RED> made.
Be sure to use this service when you
have acquired a lot of flowers.

<FACE_HANA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The store is open <BLUE>Monday, Tuesday,
Thursday, Friday and Saturday</BLUE>
from <BLUE>10 AM to 6 PM</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
During business hours, when you need
something here just ring the <RED>bell</RED>
in front of you.
